title: Why Does Beats by Dre Exist?
description: Beats EP on Amazon:  My daily headphones - Status Audio CB-1 on Amazon:  Beats by Dre BeatsX on Amazon:  The most convenient Bluetooth headphones - Apple AirPods on Amazon:  Beats by Dre Solo 3 Wireless on Amazon:  Beats by Dre Studio 3 Wireless on Amazon:  Maybe the best all around wireless headphones - Sony WH1000Xm2 on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
